name: Camping World Holdings, Inc.
description: Camping World Holdings, Inc. is a leading retailer of recreational vehicles (RVs) and outdoor lifestyle products in the United States. Founded in 1966 by David Garvin, Camping World has grown from a single store in Bowling Green, Kentucky, to a national powerhouse with over 170 locations across the country. The company operates a broad range of businesses, including RV sales, service, and parts, as well as financing and insurance offerings. Camping World caters to a diverse clientele, from seasoned RV enthusiasts to families looking for outdoor adventure. The company is dedicated to enhancing the RV ownership experience with products and services that support their customers' adventurous lifestyles. Camping World also owns the Good Sam Club, a leading RV membership organization that provides various benefits to its members, including discounts on camping, access to exclusive content, and travel planning resources. Through its commitment to customer satisfaction, Camping World aims to be the one-stop shop for all RV and outdoor needs, fostering a community of outdoor enthusiasts and promoting the joys of camping and adventure.

seo.meta_title: Camping World Holdings, Inc. | RVs & Outdoor Lifestyle Products
seo.meta_description: Discover Camping World, the leading retailer of recreational vehicles and outdoor products. Explore a wide range of RVs, camping gear, and services designed for outdoor enthusiasts.

faq.question: What does Camping World specialize in?
faq.answer: Camping World specializes in the sale and service of recreational vehicles (RVs) and outdoor lifestyle products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Camping World?
faq.answer: Marcus Lemonis is the CEO of Camping World Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Camping World headquartered?
faq.answer: Camping World is headquartered in Lincolnshire, Illinois, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Camping World offer?
faq.answer: Camping World offers a variety of products including motorhomes, travel trailers, camping equipment, and outdoor gear.
